prompt: Image Prompt: Generate an image of a serene library filled with shelves of ancient Orthodox Christian literature, illuminated by soft candlelight. In the center of the room, depict a worn wooden desk strewn with handwritten notes and an open manuscript of traditional Christian theology. Sunlight streams through stained glass windows, casting colorful patterns on the aged tomes, creating a peaceful and scholarly atmosphere that evokes the depth and richness of Orthodox Christian teachings.
